DOC.brief_summary: This study examine naturally occur peptide call Kisspeptin might regulate blood sugar insulin level .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion/ History : stable weight previous three month , active illicit drug use , history medication reaction require emergency medical care , difficulty blood draw . Physical examination : systolic BP < 140 mm Hg , diastolic < 90 mm Hg , Laboratory study : ( per MGH reference range ) normal hemoglobin , unless hypogonadal low 0.5 gm/dL low limit reference range normal woman ( men woman hypogonadism low hemoglobin level treatment ) hemoglobin A1C < 6.5 % BUN , creatinine elevate AST , ALT < 3x upper limit normal negative serum pregnancy test ( woman ) Additional Criteria Study Population Healthy Men : history chronic disease , history diabetes first degree relative . Healthy Women : history chronic disease , except well control thyroid disease , history diabetes first degree relative , use contraceptive pill , patch vaginal ring within last 4 week . Postmenopausal Women : history chronic disease except hypercholesterolemia , thyroid disease , osteoporosis , history diabetes first degree relative , normal activate protein C resistance screen , applicable , able undergo appropriate washout hormone therapy . Men Women Impaired Glucose Tolerance ( IGT ) : diagnosis impair glucose tolerance oral glucose tolerance test , medical condition wellcontrolled . Men Women Hypogonadism diagnosis hypogonadism , medical condition wellcontrolled , applicable , able undergo appropriate washout hormone therapy .
